response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds significant value to me, as it represents years of innovation and dedication. Given its high quality and functionality, I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies us both.", "product_price": 12000}
